info.name: Enigma ManagementAPI Ingest
info.description:
Executable examples how to work with ingest of media and metadata in Engima ManagementAPI, as a Customer in the OTT-solution. This Postman-collection is divided into the following sub-categories...

- Asset Metadata
- Asset Pulication
- Asset Material
- Channel Asset
- Live2VOD Asset
- Contract
- Series and Season
- Tags


Usage:
- Import project "Enimga ManagementAPI Ingest" into Postman
- Create a Postman-environment
- Define the following variables: mgmtapihost, customer, businessunit, mgmtapiuser, mgmtapipwd, product, assetid

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
<data>
  <asset>
    <id>tags01</id>
    <titleList>
       <title language="en">Asset with Tags</title>
    </titleList>
    <tagList>
      <tag id="documentary" type="genre">
          <tagNames>
              <tagName language="en">Documentary</tagName>
              <tagName language="se">Dokument√§r</tagName>
          </tagNames>
      </tag>
    </tagList>
    <assetType>movie</assetType>
  </asset>
</data>
</publish-metadata>

item.name: Create Asset with Metadata minus Material

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-2.0.xsd ">
<data>
    <asset>
        <id>AssetWithMetadata</id>
        <studio>Enigma Television</studio>
        <productionYear>2018</productionYear>
        <countryOfOriginList>
            <country>SE</country>
        </countryOfOriginList>
        <titleList>
            <title language="en">An Interesting Title</title>
            <sortingTitle language="en">Interesting Title</sortingTitle>
        </titleList>
        <descriptionList>
            <description language="en" length="short">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</description>
            <description language="en" length="medium">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.</description>
            <description language="en" length="long">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</description>
        </descriptionList>
        <creditList>
            <credit>
                <name>Adam Actor</name>
                <rolename>Winter White</rolename>
                <function>Actor</function>
            </credit>
        </creditList>
        <tagList>
            <tag id="DRAMA" type="genre">
                <tagNames>
                    <tagName language="en">Drama</tagName>
                </tagNames>
            </tag>
            <tag id="THRILLER" type="genre">
                <tagNames>
                    <tagName language="en">Thriller</tagName>
                </tagNames>
            </tag>
        </tagList>
        <imageList>
            <image language="en" priority="0">
                <id>breaking_bad_episode_image_s01e05</id>
                <url>https://dummyimage.com/1600x900/FFFFFF/000000/test.png?text=Metadata%20Asset</url>
                <width>1600</width>
                <height>900</height>
                <purpose>banner</purpose>
                <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                <copyright>MIT</copyright>
            </image>
        </imageList>
        <externalReferenceList>
            <externalReference>
                <provider>Wikipedia</provider>
                <id>15465618</id>
                <uri>https://en.wikipedia.org/?curid=</uri>
            </externalReference>
        </externalReferenceList>
        <assetType>movie</assetType>
        <drmRestrictions>
            <includeCountries>
                <country>SE</country>
            </includeCountries>
        </drmRestrictions>
    </asset>
</data>
</publish-metadata>

item.name: Add Publication on Mobile Device to Asset

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
<data>
    <publicationList>
        <publication>
            <id>publication01</id>
            <assetIdRef>{{assetid}}</assetIdRef>
            <startTime>2016-06-30T00:00:00.000Z</startTime>
            <endTime>2018-06-30T00:00:00.000Z</endTime>
            <publishTime>2016-06-30T00:00:00.000Z</publishTime>
            <publicationRights>
                <productList>
                    <product>{{product}}</product>
                </productList>
                <serviceList>
                	<service>MOBILE</service>
                </serviceList>
            </publicationRights>
        </publication>
    </publicationList>
</data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Create an asset with medias with pre-defined media locators.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
<data>
  <asset>
    <id>sintel</id>
    <titleList>
       <title language="en">Asset with Subtitles</title>
    </titleList>
                    <imageList>
            <image language="en" priority="0">
                <id>sintel</id>
                <url>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.jpg</url>
                <width>700</width>
                <height>400</height>
                <purpose>banner</purpose>
            </image>
        </imageList>
        <assetType>clip</assetType>
       </asset>
  <material>
    <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
 <DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_en.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="no">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_no.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_se.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
    <expiryDate>2018-12-10T00:00:00</expiryDate>
    <purgeDate>2018-12-10T00:00:00</purgeDate>
  </material>
        <publicationList>
            <publication>
                <id>sintelPubl</id>
                <startTime>2018-06-01T13:22:28.263Z</startTime>
                <endTime>2019-12-31T00:00:00.000Z</endTime>
                <publishTime>2018-06-01T14:22:28.264Z</publishTime>
                <publicationRights>
                    <productList>
                        <product>{{product}}</product>
                    </productList>
                </publicationRights>
            </publication>
        </publicationList>
</data>
</publish-metadata>

<v1:publish-metadata xmlns:v1="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
  <v1:data>
    <!--Optional:-->
    <v1:contract>
      <v1:id>contract01</v1:id>
      <!--Optional:-->
      <v1:externalId>contract01</v1:externalId>
      <v1:contractName>studio contract</v1:contractName>
      <!--Optional:-->
      <v1:originator>{{customer}}</v1:originator>
      <v1:created>2018-04-05T15:22:14+02:00</v1:created>
      <!--Optional:-->
      <v1:assetRights>
        <!--Optional:-->
            </v1:assetRights>
      <!--Optional:-->
      <v1:allowedCountries>
